sections.text:
81-2271.Rules and regulations.

The Department of Health and Human Services shall adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to establish procedures and standards to implement the intent of sections 81-2268 to 81-2271.

SourceLaws 1993, LB 801, ยง 7;Laws 1996, LB 1044, ยง 893;Laws 2009, LB288, ยง 38.
